price: 77. C’est à Allah qu’appartiennent les secrets inconnaissables (ghayb) des cieux et de la terre. La question de l’avènement de l’Heure est aussi rapide qu’un clin d’œil, ou plus fulgurant  encore ! Allah est certes de Toute chose Infiniment Capable.
arabic: وَلِلَّهِ غَيۡبُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَمَآ أَمۡرُ ٱلسَّاعَةِ إِلَّا كَلَمۡحِ ٱلۡبَصَرِ أَوۡ هُوَ أَقۡرَبُۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٞ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: walillahi ghaybu al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wamā amru al-sāʿati illā kalamḥi al-baṣari aw huwa aqrabu inna al-laha ʿalā kulli shayin qadīrun
